6000.description:
He is six feet tall and looks quite strong, muscles bulging under his heavy,
chequered shirt.  His features are worn with hard work and his expression is
one of a peaceful man leading a simple life.
6000.long_desc: John the Lumberjack is here, looking for some trees to chop down.
6000.name: john

6001.description: It is a small, furry creature with long ears and big feet.
6001.long_desc: A small rabbit is foraging in the bushes here.
6001.name: rabbit

6002.description:
The bear is a big, brown, furry animal with very large claws and very sharp
teeth.  It doesn't resemble those cute little dolls from toy shops at all.
6002.long_desc: A big, brown, angry-looking bear is here.
6002.name: bear

6003.description:
This small, furry creature with long ears and big feet has been attacked
by the dreaded rabbit rabies, a horrible disease that turns helpless and
innocent rabbits into ferocious and bloodthirsty monsters.
6003.long_desc: A ferocious rabbit is here, glaring hungrily at you.
6003.name: rabbit

6004.description:
She is a graceful creature on long, slender legs, and with large, brown eyes
looking back at you with an air of watchful interest.
6004.long_desc: A fallow deer is grazing peacefully here.
6004.name: deer

6005.description: It is a large fox with beautiful, red-brown fur and a long, thick bushy tail.
6005.long_desc: A brown fox is stalking rabbits through the underbrush here.
6005.name: fox

6006.description: The bird isn't going to live much longer, by the looks of it.
6006.long_desc: A large bird with a broken wing has been cornered here.
6006.name: bird

6007.description:
The bobcat has sharp claws and teeth, and will probably eat you instead of
the bird if you give it the chance.
6007.long_desc: A medium sized bobcat is stalking a bird here.
6007.name: bobcat

6008.description: The sparrow looks like it is enjoying life.
6008.long_desc: A sparrow is flapping around by the ground.
6008.name: sparrow

6009.description: The robin looks quite intent on finding a bug or worm to eat.
6009.long_desc: A robin is hopping around looking for bugs to eat.
6009.name: robin

6010.description:
It peers out of its nest at you anxiously, seeming to plead silently with
you to leave it alone.
6010.long_desc: A squirrel is here seeking refuge in its nest.
6010.name: squirrel

6011.description:
The badger is slowly awakening and peering up at you from its burrow. You
know that it won't be moving this slow for long.  Its sharp claws and teeth
catch your attention when you consider killing it.
6011.long_desc: A furry brown badger is curled up under a log here.
6011.name: badger

6012.description:
This happy creature seems to pay you no heed as it goes about its search for
nuts among the leaves and twigs on the ground here.
6012.long_desc: A grey squirrel with a bushy tail is foraging for nuts here.
6012.name: grey

6013.description:
The absolute zenith of hyperactivity, this small rodent seems to never tire
of running up, down, and around the trees in this area.  If you could ever
catch it, you imagine it would make an easy meal.
6013.long_desc: A small brown-red chipmunk dashes from tree to tree here.
6013.name: chipmunk

6014.description: The bird eyes you warily, but continues with its meal.
6014.long_desc: A large black bird flits about here, picking at bits of carrion.
6014.name: crow

6015.description:
It sickens you to even look at this foul bird.  Bits of dried gore stick to
its beak, and unidentifiable organs hang from its talons and feathers.  
It sees you and attacks, protecting its horrible feast!
6015.long_desc: A grotesque vulture covered in blood and gore is here feeding madly.
6015.name: grotesque

6016.description:
This young male deer is drinking from the edge of the lake and watching you
warily.  His antlers are not full size yet, and will no doubt be quite 
impressive in a few years.
6016.long_desc: A young 5-point buck is drinking from the lake here.
6016.name: buck

6017.description: The fish looks about the right size for a meal.
6017.long_desc: A fish is swimming about here.
6017.name: fish

6018.description: The duckling is adorable, it looks most of all like a tiny furball.
6018.long_desc: A duckling is swimming around in the pond.
6018.name: duckling

6000.name: axe
6000.room_desc: A heavy lumber axe lies here.

6002.name: boots
6002.room_desc: A pair of worn leather boots lies here.
6002.short_desc: a pair of worn leather boots

6003.name: fireplace
6003.room_desc: A fireplace made from stone is set against the east wall.

6004.name: lantern
6004.room_desc: A hooded brass lantern has been left here.

6005.name: chest
6005.room_desc: A wooden chest stands in the corner.

6006.name: key
6006.room_desc: A small brass key lies here.

6007.name: coins
6007.room_desc: Some gold coins lie piled up in a heap on the floor.

6010.name: blackberries
6010.room_desc: Some blackberries grow on a bush nearby.

6012.name: sign
6012.room_desc: A large sign mounted on a pole is standing by the roadside.

6013.name: barrel
6013.room_desc: A water barrel has been left here.

6014.name: water
6014.room_desc: A small brook trickles through the forest beside the path.

6018.name: slab
6018.room_desc: A large piece of freshly cut boar meat is on the ground here.

6019.name: tusks
6019.room_desc: A pair of large boar tusks have been dropped here.

6022.name: egg
6022.room_desc: A small bluish egg has been left here.

6023.name: meat
6023.room_desc: A large piece of rabbit meat.

6050.name: a barkbound journal
6050.room_desc: A barkbound journal rests on the platform.
6050.description: The pages are stitched with reed fibers and smell of pine.
6050.lore_text: "We ward the forest paths, guiding the lost and turning back those who would burn the groves."

6051.name: an oath of Haon-Dor
6051.room_desc: A scroll of green vellum lies atop the altar.
6051.description: Leaf-inked vows spiral down the page.
6051.lore_text: "To the roots we pledge, to the canopy we answer, and to the wild we belong."

6052.name: a fae-etched casket
6052.room_desc: A fae-etched casket is tucked beneath the bench.
6052.description: Delicate etchings shimmer when you look away.

6053.name: a moonlit antler charm
6053.room_desc: A pale antler charm glows softly here.
6053.description: Carved from shed antler and bound with silver thread.

6054.name: a carved oak key
6054.room_desc: A carved oak key has been wedged into a stump.
6054.description: The key is inlaid with small leaf motifs.

6058.name: sprig of life
6058.room_desc: A sprig of life lies here.

6000.description:
The area opens at the end of a dusty road, near the eastern edge of the
large forest of Haon-Dor. To the east you see the road heading back to
the walled city, Midgaard, and to the west is a narrow trail leading
through the forest. The air is fresh and clean. Wildflowers dot the
landscape.

east.description: To the east a dusty road takes you back to the walls of Midgaard, and its large west gate.

north.description: You see an exit north.

west.description: You see a narrow forest trail winding westward in between the trees.

6000.name: The Edge Of The Forest

6001.description:
The area is a trail leading through the forest. There seems to be a
small path leading north into the shadows. To the east is the forest
edge and to the west the trail leads further into the forest. The forest
floor is carpeted with fallen leaves. Bird calls echo through the
canopy.

east.description: The trail continues eastwards out of the forest.

north.description: You see evidence of a small path leading through a break in the trees to the north.

west.description: You see the narrow forest trail winding westwards in between the trees.

6001.name: A Trail Through The Light Forest

6002.description:
The area is a narrow trail winding east and west through the forest. To
the west, the forest gradually becomes more dense. A small forest path
leads off to the south. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the
light. The scent of pine and earth fills the air.

east.description: The trail continues eastwards through the young trees.

south.description: The small path leads south through the young trees.

west.description: You see the narrow forest trail winding westwards into the dense forest.

6002.name: A Trail Through The Light Forest

6003.description:
The area is a trail winding east and west through the dense forest. To
the east, the forest gradually seems to become lighter. The forest floor
is carpeted with fallen leaves. The scent of pine and earth fills the
air.

east.description: The trail continues eastwards to the younger part of the forest.

west.description: You see the narrow trail winding westwards through the dense forest.

6003.name: A Trail Through The Dense Forest

6004.description:
The area is a trail winding east and west through the dense forest. To
the west, the trees are so huge and their crowns so dense that forest
remains in total darkness. A small path leads south through the trees.
Ancient trees rise on all sides. The forest floor is carpeted with
fallen leaves.

east.description: The trail continues eastwards through the dense forest.

south.description: The small path leads south through the trees.

west.description: The narrow trail almost seems to disappear between the enormous trunks.

6004.name: A Trail Through The Dense Forest

6005.description:
The area is a small path leading through the dense forest. The crowns of
the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination. The
path continues north and south. A patch of moss to the west looks
freshly disturbed. The scent of pine and earth fills the air. Bird calls
echo through the canopy.

north.description: The small path leads north through the trees.

south.description: The small path leads south through the trees.

west.description: A narrow opening veiled by moss.
west.reveal_message: You part the moss, revealing a hidden hollow to the west.

6005.name: A Small Path In The Dense Forest

6006.description:
The area is a small path leading through the dense forest. The crowns of
the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination. The
path continues north and east. The scent of pine and earth fills the
air. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves.

east.description: The small path leads east through the trees.

north.description: The small path leads north through the trees.

6006.name: A Small Path In The Dense Forest

6007.description:
The area is a small path leading through the dense forest. The crowns of
the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination. The
forest gradually lightens to the east. Paths lead east, west and south.
Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light. Bird calls echo
through the canopy.

east.description: You can barely make out a clearing to the east.

south.description: The small path leads south through the trees.

west.description: The small path leads west through the trees.

6007.name: An Intersection In The Dense Forest

6008.description:
This is a clearing in the forest. Lots of fresh stumps of varying sizes
protrude from the ground and heavy logs are stacked neatly in a big pile
supported by stakes set into the ground. Paths lead north, east and
west. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves. The scent of pine
and earth fills the air.

east.description: The small path leads east through the trees.

north.description: The small path leads north through the trees.

west.description: The small path leads west through the trees.

extra_descs.ven though the logs have been chopped to: as they are fresh and still filled with sap.

6008.name: The Forest Clearing

6009.description:
The area is outside a small cabin built entirely from heavy logs. There
is a wooden door to the north and small paths lead west and south
through the trees. Bird calls echo through the canopy. The forest floor
is carpeted with fallen leaves.

north.description: The wooden door is quite sturdy but does not appear to be equipped with a lock.

south.description: The small path leads south through the dense forest.

west.description: The small path leads west through the light forest.

6009.name: Outside A Small Cabin In The Forest

6011.description:
The area is a small path leading through the forest. The trees are tall
and slender. Paths lead north and south. Ancient trees rise on all
sides. The scent of pine and earth fills the air.

north.description: The path leads north through the young trees.

south.description: The path leads south through the young trees.

6011.name: A Small Path Through The Light Forest

6012.description:
The area is a small path leading through the dense forest. The crowns of
the old trees leave the forest floor in an unreal twilight illumination.
Paths lead north, east and south. Ancient trees rise on all sides. The
forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves.

east.description: The small path leads east through the trees.

north.description: The small path leads north through the trees.

south.description: The small path leads south through the trees.

6012.name: An Intersection In The Dense Forest

6013.description:
The area is a small path leading through the dense forest. The crowns of
the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination. The
path continues east and west. Ancient trees rise on all sides. Bird
calls echo through the canopy.

east.description: The small path leads east through the trees.

west.description: The small path leads west through the trees.

6013.name: A Small Path In The Dense Forest

6014.description:
The area is a small path leading through the dense forest. The forest
gradually lightens to the north. Paths lead north, east and west.
Ancient trees rise on all sides. The forest floor is carpeted with
fallen leaves.

east.description: The small path leads east through the trees.

north.description: The path leads north to a lighter part of the forest.

west.description: The small path leads west through the trees.

6014.name: An Intersection In The Dense Forest

6015.description:
The area is a small path leading through the dense forest. The crowns of
the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination. The
path continues south and west. Ancient trees rise on all sides. Branches
intertwine overhead, filtering the light.

south.description: The small path leads south through the trees.

west.description: The small path leads west through the trees.

6015.name: A Small Path In The Dense Forest

6016.description:
The area is a small path leading through the dense forest. The crowns of
the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination. The
path continues north, south and east. Ancient trees rise on all sides.
Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light.

east.description: The small path leads east through the trees.

north.description: The small path leads north through the trees.

south.description: The small path leads south through the trees.

6016.name: A Small Path In The Dense Forest

6017.description:
This is a turn on a small path leading through the dense forest. The
forest seems to become lighter to the west. The path continues north and
west. Ancient trees rise on all sides. Bird calls echo through the
canopy.

north.description: The small path leads north through the trees.

west.description: The small path leads west through the trees to a lighter part of the forest.

6017.name: A Small Path In The Dense Forest

6018.description:
The area is a small path leading through the forest. A path leads north
to a small field and other paths lead east and west into the dense
forest. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves. Ancient trees
rise on all sides.

east.description: The path leads east to a dense part of the forest.

north.description: The path leads north to a small, grassy field.

west.description: The path leads west to a dense part of the forest.

6018.name: An Intersection In The Light Forest

6019.description:
The area is a small path leading through the dense forest. The forest
seems to become lighter to the east. The path continues north and east.
The scent of pine and earth fills the air. Branches intertwine overhead,
filtering the light.

east.description: The small path leads east through the trees to a lighter part of the forest.

north.description: The small path leads north through the trees.

6019.name: A Small Path In The Dense Forest

6020.description:
The area is a small path leading through the dense forest. The crowns of
the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination. The
path continues south and west. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering
the light. The scent of pine and earth fills the air.

south.description: The small path leads south through the trees.

west.description: The small path leads west through the trees.

6020.name: A Small Path In The Dense Forest

6021.description:
The area is a small path leading through the dense forest. To the west
you see a dark cave entrance, leading into a small hillside. The path
continues north and east. The scent of pine and earth fills the air.
Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light.

east.description: The small path leads east through the trees.

north.description: The small path leads north through the trees.

west.description: The cave is very dark.

6021.name: A Small Path In The Dense Forest

6022.description:
This is a natural cave. Various sorts of debris cover the stone floor,
emitting a rather unpleasant smell that makes the air thick and hard to
breathe. The only obvious exit is east. Dust motes drift in the stale
air. Shadows gather in the corners.

east.description: The cave opening is to the east.

6022.name: Inside The Cave

6023.description:
This is a grass covered field somewhere in the forest. The tall grass
nearly reaches your waist, and the surrounding oaks and beeches form an
almost wall-like thicket on the east side of the field. To the northeast
Visible is a small lake. A small path leads south through the trees, and
the field opens up to the north and west. The open sky stretches
overhead. The ground is soft underfoot.

east.description: The ground slopes gently downward to the eastern tree line.

north.description: Wind blowing in from the north carries with it the smell of a newly killed animal, as well as the noise of many birds, which you can see circling there.

south.description: The small path leads south in between the trees.

6023.name: A Grassy Field

6024.description:
This is a lower part of the grassy field, south of a small lake. The
grass here has been trampled by the many animals coming here for water,
leaving the ground covered in tracks of different types. To the west you
see a break in the wall of trees surrounding the field, and to the north
is a small lake. Tall grass sways in a gentle breeze. The air is fresh
and clean.

north.description: The animal tracks lead off to the north, and around the lake there.

west.description: To the south-west you see a break in the tree line, leading back to the forest path.

6024.name: The Lower Part Of The Grassy Field

6025.description:
The grass stops shortly before the lake, replaced by mud covered in
tracks from the local animals. When you come close many animals scatter
into the tall grass and some even into the forest. To the west you see
birds circling in the high in the air, and to the north you see a small
lake, surrounded by tall reeds. The field continues to the south, and
the forest blocks passage to the east. The ground is soft underfoot. The
open sky stretches overhead.

north.description: The lake looks inviting, and you can see some sort of water fowl floating around among the reeds.

south.description: To the south an animal trail leads of towards a the other side of the lower field.

west.description: The smell of carrion drifts down to you from higher on the field to the west.

6025.name: Beside The Lake In A Grassy Field

6026.description:
As you come close, scavenging animals and birds of all sorts scatter,
leaving only the boldest and stupidest encircling the corpse of a large
boar. Carrion birds circle overhead, and smaller animals stare out of
the tall grass at you. The grass here has been trampled, and a large
area around the corpse is stained by blood. A trail leads down the
sloping field to a lake, and to the south you see the path back to the
forest. The ground is soft underfoot. The air is fresh and clean.

east.description: A small lake lies down the sloping field to the east.  Some of the animals that fled from here have gone there, and are watching, waiting for you to leave so they can resume their feasting.

south.description: The field continues to the south, and you can see the path back to the forest there.

6026.name: The Northern Section Of A Grassy Field

6027.description:
This is the middle of a small lake, fed from a small stream coming
through the forest from the northwest. The water is not that clear, but
Visible is fish swimming around below. The bank is clear to the south,
providing a safe place to get back to the field. Waves crash and foam
relentlessly. The roar of water fills your ears.

south.description: Some animals have gathered on the bank to watch you, curious about what you are doing.

6027.name: On The Lake

6028.description:
The area is a small path leading through the dense forest. The crowns of
the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination. The
path continues to the west and south. Ancient trees rise on all sides.
The scent of pine and earth fills the air.

south.description: To the south, a narrow trail slips toward Near A Large Tree In The Dense Forest. Sun-dappled leaves sway overhead and birdsong filters through the trees.

west.description: The small path leads west through the trees.

6028.name: A Small Path In The Dense Forest

6029.description:
This is the end of a small path leading through the dense forest. The
crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight
illumination. This rough clearing is dominated by a very large oak tree,
probably the largest in this part of the forest. The path leads back to
the north. Ancient trees rise on all sides. Branches intertwine
overhead, filtering the light.

north.description: To the north, a narrow trail slips toward A Small Path In The Dense Forest. Sun-dappled leaves sway overhead and birdsong filters through the trees.

up.description: You see the lower branches of the towering oak.

6029.name: Near A Large Tree In The Dense Forest

6030.description:
This is a huge oak, about one third of the way to the top. The branches
above block out much of the light, but enough filters through for you to
see. Small animals and birds scatter at your approach, rustling the
leaves all about you. You could easily climb back down to the ground, or
continue up the tree. One large branch juts outward to the west,
possibly providing a third choice of exit. High in the branches, a
platform is barely visible among the leaves. The air is thin and cold at
this altitude. Snow clings to shadowed crevices.

down.description: The rough clearing is just a quick climb and jump below you.

up.description: A rope ladder blends with the bark.
up.reveal_message: You find a rope ladder hidden in the canopy.

west.description: This limb looks large and strong enough for you to walk most of the way along its length to the west.

6030.name: In The Lower Branches Of A Large Oak

6031.description:
This sturdy branch hangs far out over a path to the west, which you
might be able to jump down to. Several squirrels scamper into hiding as
you approach, leaving you alone and swaying slightly with the wind. To
your north Visible is a small log cabin through the trees, and to the
southeast there seems to be some sort of clearing, with many birds
circling above it. Bird calls echo through the canopy. The forest floor
is carpeted with fallen leaves.

down.description: Below you is a small path, probably used by the forest animals.  You think that you could jump down with a little effort.

east.description: Back to the east you see the tree trunk.  It is much less precarious there compared to here... perhaps you should go back.

6031.name: Out On A Limb In A Large Oak

6032.description:
This is a huge oak, about midway to the top. The branches above block
out much of the light, but enough filters through for you to see. A few
birds have remained to watch you from the fringe branches, well out of
your reach. Scratches mar the tree here, and torn bark is scattered near
you on the branch. It would seem some large forest cat lives nearby, so
you had better be careful! You can continue a bit farther up the tree,
or descend to limbs that don't sway so much. The wind howls around
exposed peaks. Bare rock dominates the landscape.

down.description: Below you, a narrow trail slips toward In The Lower Branches Of A Large Oak. Sun-dappled leaves sway overhead and birdsong filters through the trees.

up.description: Above you the tree narrows farther, but it still looks like you could climb up there.  A feline shape is pacing about above you, trying to get to a large wounded bird.  Perhaps you should try to see what sort of cat this is before you interrupt its hunt... it might eat you instead of the bird.

6032.name: Midway To The Top Of The Large Oak

6060.description:
The area is a small shaded path leading through the trees. The forest
gradually lightens to the east. The path continues to the north, and to
the south you see the main trail. The scent of pine and earth fills the
air. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light.

north.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

south.description: Through a break in the tree line you see the main trail that heads back towards Midgaard.

6060.name: A Shaded Path Through The Forest

6061.description:
This is a turn on a small shadowed path leading through the forest. The
forest seems to become lighter to the west. The path continues north and
west. Ancient trees rise on all sides. The scent of pine and earth fills
the air.

north.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

west.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

6061.name: A Shaded Path Through The Forest

6062.description:
The area is a small shaded path leading through the dense forest. The
crowns of the old trees leave the forest floor in an unreal twililght
illumination. To the north you see a small clearing. Paths lead east and
west. Ancient trees rise on all sides. The scent of pine and earth fills
the air.

east.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

north.description: Through the underbrush you see a small clearing.

west.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

6062.name: A Shaded Path Through The Dense Forest

6063.description:
The area is a small shaded path through the dense forest. The crowns of
the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination. The
path continues north and east. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering
the light. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves.

east.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

north.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

6063.name: A Shaded Path Through The Dense Forest

6064.description:
The area is a small shadowy path leading through the dense forest. The
crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight
illumination. The path continues north and south. The forest floor is
carpeted with fallen leaves. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the
light.

north.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

south.description: The path winds its way into darkness.

6064.name: A Shadowy Path Through The Dense Forest

6065.description:
This is a turn on a small shaded path winding through the trees. The
forest gradually becomes more dense to the west. The path continues west
and south from here. The scent of pine and earth fills the air. Ancient
trees rise on all sides.

south.description: Through the trees to the south you can almost see the main trail leading back to Midgaard.

west.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

6065.name: A Shaded Path Through The Forest

6066.description:
This is a fork in the small shaded path winding through the trees. The
forest gradually becomes more dense to the west. The path branches to
the north and south here, and also continues to the east. Branches
intertwine overhead, filtering the light. Ancient trees rise on all
sides.

east.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

north.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

south.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

6066.name: A Fork On The Shaded Path Through The Forest

6067.description:
This is a small clearing, beside a large fallen tree. A large amount of
the tree has already decomposed, but some pieces remain, scattered about
the clearing. Paths border the clearing to the north and south. The
scent of pine and earth fills the air. Ancient trees rise on all sides.

north.description: A shaded path winds its way northeast between the trees.

south.description: A shaded path winds its way east between the trees.

6067.name: At The Fallen Tree

6068.description:
The area is a small shaded path leading through the dense forest. The
crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight
illumination. The path continues north, south, and west. The scent of
pine and earth fills the air. Bird calls echo through the canopy.

north.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

south.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

west.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

6068.name: An Intersection On The Shaded Path

6069.description:
The area is a small shadowy path leading through the dense forest. The
crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight
illumination. The path continues south and east. Branches intertwine
overhead, filtering the light. Ancient trees rise on all sides.

east.description: The path winds its way between the old trees.

south.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

6069.name: A Shadowy Path Through The Dense Forest

6070.description:
The area is wandering amongst the trees in the light forest, without the
aid of a path or trail. More sunlight trickles through the treetops
here, making your travel a bit easier. Small animals scurry away as you
approach. The area is no longer on a path, so you may go whichever way
you please. A stitched screen of leaves to the north looks out of place.
The scent of pine and earth fills the air. Branches intertwine overhead,
filtering the light.

east.description: The trees seem to part, exposing a trail into the shade.

north.description: A woven screen hides a blind.
north.reveal_message: You find a leaf-screened door set into the brush.

south.description: The trees seem to part, exposing a trail into the shade.

west.description: The trees seem to part, exposing a trail into the shade.

6070.name: Off Of The Path In The Shaded Forest

6071.description:
The area is a small shaded path leading in between the trees. The forest
gradually lightens to the east. Paths lead west and south, and you think
you see a small path leading eastward. Bird calls echo through the
canopy. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light.

east.description: It looks like a small path begins between two trees to the east, but you aren't quite certain.

south.description: The path winds its way through the trees to an split in the path.

west.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

6071.name: A Shaded Path Through The Forest

6072.description:
The area is a small shaded path leading between the trees. The forest
gradually becomes more dense to the west. Paths lead north and east, and
you see a small clearing to the south. Ancient trees rise on all sides.
Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light.

east.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

north.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

south.description: A lightly traveled path heads southward to a small clearing.

6072.name: A Shaded Path Though The Forest

6073.description:
The area is a small shadowy path leading through the dense forest. To
the north the terrain becomes quite hilly and rough. The crowns of the
old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination. The path
continues north and south. Sheep trails wind between the hillocks. Rocks
jut from the grassy slopes.

north.description: The path winds its way into the hills and denser forest.

south.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

6073.name: A Shadowy Path Through The Dense Forest

6074.description:
You have just left the shaded path, and you are now standing at the head
of a very short trail. It looks like someone begin clearing away the
underbrush here, but didn't get finished. You may leave in any
direction, but the path is to the west. The scent of pine and earth
fills the air. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light.

east.description: The trees seem to part, exposing a trail into the shade.

north.description: The trees seem to part, exposing a trail into the shade.

south.description: The trees seem to part, exposing a trail into the shade.

west.description: Through the underbrush you see a small path winding its way northward.

6074.name: A Small Trail Through The Forest

6075.description:
The area is a small shaded path leading between the trees. The forest
gradually becomes more dense to the west, and to the northwest the
terrain is quite hilly. The path continues north and south. To the east
you see a trail winding through the younger section of the forest.
Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light. Bird calls echo
through the canopy.

east.description: You think you see the beginnings of a small trail through the younger part of the forest.

north.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

south.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

6075.name: A Shaded Path Through The Forest

6076.description:
The area opens among tightly packed trees between several hills. You
lost track of the path long ago, and now must rely on your instincts to
guide you. The ground is very rough and rocky here, and only the most
hardy plants survive. The crowns of the old trees leave the hills in an
unreal twilight illumination. The view stretches for miles in every
direction. The wind carries the scent of wild herbs.

east.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

north.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

south.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

west.description: All you see are trees and a shadowy path.

6076.name: In The Dense Forest Between The Hills

6077.description:
The area opens among tightly packed trees between several hills. You
lost track of the path long ago, and now must rely on your instincts to
guide you. The ground is very rough and rocky here, and only the most
hardy plants survive. The crowns of the old trees leave the hills in an
unreal twilight illumination. Rocks jut from the grassy slopes. The view
stretches for miles in every direction.

east.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

north.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

south.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

west.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

6077.name: In The Dense Forest Between The Hills

6078.description:
This is the end of a small shaded path leading between the trees. The
forest is quite thick here, and the ground is very rough and hilly,
halting your progress. The path lies to the south. The view stretches
for miles in every direction. Rocks jut from the grassy slopes.

south.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

6078.name: In The Dense Forest Between The Hills

6079.description:
The area opens among tightly packed trees between several hills. You
lost track of the path long ago, and now must rely on your instincts to
guide you. The ground is very rough and rocky here, and only the most
hardy plants survive. The crowns of the old trees leave the hills in an
unreal twilight illumination. The view stretches for miles in every
direction. Rocks jut from the grassy slopes.

east.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

north.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

south.description: All you see are trees and a shadowy path.

west.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

6079.name: In The Dense Forest Between The Hills

6080.description:
The area opens among tightly packed trees between several hills. You
lost track of the path long ago, and now must rely on your instincts to
guide you. The ground is very rough and rocky here, and only the most
hardy plants survive. The crowns of the old trees leave the hills in an
unreal twilight illumination. A circle of mushrooms glows faintly to the
west. The wind carries the scent of wild herbs. The terrain rolls and
dips around.

east.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

north.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

south.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

west.description: A shimmering gap between the trees.
west.reveal_message: Magic parts the trees, revealing a fae ring to the west.

6080.name: In The Dense Forest Between The Hills

6081.description:
The area opens among tightly packed trees between several hills. You
lost track of the path long ago, and now must rely on your instincts to
guide you. The ground is very rough and rocky here, and only the most
hardy plants survive. The crowns of the old trees leave the hills in an
unreal twilight illumination. Rocks jut from the grassy slopes. The
terrain rolls and dips around.

east.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

north.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

south.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

west.description: All you see are trees and a shadowy path.

6081.name: In The Dense Forest Between The Hills

6082.description:
The area opens among tightly packed trees on a medium sized hill. The
dense forest spreads out all around, and the crowns of the old trees
leave the hills in an unreal twilight illumination. The view stretches
for miles in every direction. The terrain rolls and dips around.

east.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

north.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

south.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

6082.name: In The Dense Forest Between The Hills

6090.description:
The area is a dust covered east-west road through the western plains. An
occasional hunter or adventurer can be seen, heading to or from the
forest. To the east is the walled city, Midgaard, and to the west the
road ends at the head of a narrow trail into a large forest. Wildflowers
dot the landscape. The open sky stretches overhead.

east.description: Far to the east you see the large walls guarding Midgaard.

west.description: To the west the dusty trail ends, and becomes a narrow trail into the cool shadows of the forest.

6090.name: A Road Through The Plains

6091.description:
The area is a dust covered east-west road through the western plains. An
occasional hunter or adventurer can be seen, heading to or from the
forest. To the east is the walled city, Midgaard, and to the west the
road continues towards a large forest. Tall grass sways in a gentle
breeze. The ground is soft underfoot.

east.description: Far to the east you see the walls and western gate of Midgaard.

west.description: You see the large forest, Haon-Dor, stretching out far to the west, and to the northwest you the forest gives way to hills.

6091.name: A Road Through The Plains

6092.description:
The area is a dust covered east-west road crossing the grassy plains
between Midgaard the forest of Haon-Dor. An occasional hunter or
adventurer can be seen, heading to or from the forest. To the east is
the walled city, Midgaard, and to the west the road continues towards a
large forest. Buildings crowd together on all sides. The smell of smoke
and humanity hangs in the air.

east.description: To the east you see the walls and West Gate of Midgaard.

west.description: To the west the road continues towards the forest.

6092.name: A Road Through The Plains

6093.name: A Moss-Covered Hollow
6093.description:
A quiet hollow blanketed in thick moss. The air is cool, and a stone
altar sits beneath an ancient tree root. Ancient trees rise on all
sides. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves.

east.description: The mossy opening leads back east.

6094.name: The Canopy Hideaway
6094.description:
A hidden platform lashed between branches. From here, the forest canopy
stretches like a living sea. Ancient trees rise on all sides. Bird calls
echo through the canopy.

down.description: The rope ladder descends back down.

6095.name: The Hunter's Blind
6095.description:
This well-hidden blind overlooks a deer trail. A small cache is tucked
beneath a bench. Bird calls echo through the canopy. The scent of pine
and earth fills the air.

south.description: You push back through the leaf screen.

6096.name: A Fae Ring
6096.description:
A ring of pale mushrooms encircles a tranquil clearing. The air tastes
of rain and old magic. The scent of pine and earth fills the air.
Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light.

east.description: The trees part back toward the forest.

6010.name: Inside The Small Cabin
6010.description: The interior of the small cabin is rustic but well-maintained. A stone fireplace dominates one wall, and simple wooden furniture fills the space.

6033.name: The Top Of The Large Oak
6033.description: You have reached the crown of the massive oak tree. The canopy spreads around you, and through gaps in the leaves you can see for miles across the forest.
